attributes.action: Stop MPs from having paid employment outside of Parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
"A man cannot serve two masters". It is impossible for an MP to remain impartial if he has a relationship with an entity on one side of a parliamentary decision, no matter how well intentioned.
MPs should not be remunerated by outside interests, ie have a job outwith Parliament.
The only exception would be non-exec positions with recognised Charities.
This would help prevent the appearance of sleaze in MP's lobbying activities.
attributes.background: Make it illegal for MPs to receive remuneration for carrying out activities on behalf of commercial organisations.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581451
